parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>gr2 </name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes MP event handler added by [[addMPEventHandler]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''removeMPEventHandler''' [event, index]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> event: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - index returned by [[addMPEventHandler]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>player '''removeMPEventHandler''' ["MPKilled", 0]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Event Handlers|EventHandlers list]], [[addMPEventHandler]], [[removeAllMPEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 25 July, 2011</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:kju|kju]]</dt>
<dd class="note">At least for MPKilled it needs to be executed where the target unit is local. The effect (the removal) is global.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
